results.name: Inverse binomial transform of A088311.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..443
formula: E.g.f.: exp(-x) * Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 15 2018
mathematica: max = 20; t = Table[k!*PartitionsQ[k], {k, 0, max}]; Table[Differences[t, n], {n, 0, max}][[All, 1]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 02 2017 *)
